message: I'm offering you a product for $10000. I want to assure you that I'm confident in the quality of this product, but I'm willing to take a risk to sell it to you. I'm starting with a low-quality product, which I know might not be the best representation of what I have to offer. However, I'm willing to give you a chance to test the waters. If you're interested, I'll give you a 50/50 chance to buy this product at the discounted price of $8000. If you decline, I'll move on to the next round with a new product.
I'm not interested in buying the product at the current price. I'd like to wait for more information about the product's quality and see if you can offer a better deal.
